column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////In terms of deep dish
column2: Im not sure it was my favorite
column3: but it was certainly very good. I loved the freshness of their tomato sauce
column4: but I thought the butter crust (tm) could use just a dash of salt to balance the buttery richness out. The sausage on the pizza is a favorite of many
column5: but I didn't love the way its done here. Instead of being bits of sausage throughout
column6: this is more one huge disc of sausage that covers the whole pizza. That is my fault in ordering it though
column7: and will try a different variation next time I am back. The spinach mix was lovely though and added a lot of flavor to our pizza. Oh
column8: and if you order a family sized salad
column9: its huge. We were laughing because it took the entire table up
column10: but the sweet dressing they make is really good!
